title: Psychological trauma and post-traumatic growth in parents of children with sickle cell disease

Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Ali Alsaad, Abdullah Alghanim, Mohammed Aldawood, Ali Al Zaid, Hussain Aldehneen, Rawan Aldrees, Ammar Alsalem, Sami Albattat, Abbas Al Mutair
